languages.text: "Что притих, Абеляр? Подбираешь местечко по вкусу? Вон тот гробик расписной вполне ничего!"
"You're awful quiet there, Abelard. Are you picking out a nice spot for yourself? That pretty little casket looks as good as any!"
languages.original_text: "Что притих, Абеляр? Подбираешь местечко по вкусу? Вон тот гробик расписной вполне ничего!"

traits.locale_text: "You're awful quiet, Abelard. Are you picking a nice spot for yourself? That pretty little casket looks as good as any!"

"You're awful quiet there, Abelard. Are you picking out a nice spot for yourself? That pretty little casket looks as good as any!"

languages.text: "Ihr seid recht still, Abelard. Sucht Ihr Euch ein hübsches Fleckchen aus? Dieser nette kleine Sarg wäre doch vielleicht was!"
languages.original_text: "You're awful quiet there, Abelard. Are you picking out a nice spot for yourself? That pretty little casket looks as good as any!"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr seid recht still, Abelard. Sucht Ihr Euch ein hübsches Fleckchen aus? Dieser nette kleine Sarg wäre doch vielleicht was!"

languages.text: « Eh bien, Abélard, on ne vous entend plus, tout d'un coup. Vous cherchez votre futur petit coin de paradis ? Ma foi, ce charmant cercueil devrait faire l'affaire ! »
languages.original_text: "You're awful quiet there, Abelard. Are you picking out a nice spot for yourself? That pretty little casket looks as good as any!"

traits.locale_text: « Eh bien, Abélard, on ne vous entend plus, tout d'un coup. Vous cherchez votre futur petit coin de paradis ? Ma foi, ce charmant cercueil devrait faire l'affaire ! »

languages.text: «Está muy callado, Abelard. ¿Está eligiendo sitio? ¡Ese ferétro de ahí parece tan bueno como cualquier otro!».
languages.original_text: "You're awful quiet there, Abelard. Are you picking out a nice spot for yourself? That pretty little casket looks as good as any!"

traits.locale_text: «Está muy callado, Abelard. ¿Está eligiendo sitio? ¡Ese ferétro de ahí parece tan bueno como cualquier otro!».

languages.text: 「アベラルド、随分と静かね。自分の為に場所選びをしているのか？あのかわいい棺は、どの棺よりもよく見えるわ！」
languages.original_text: "You're awful quiet there, Abelard. Are you picking out a nice spot for yourself? That pretty little casket looks as good as any!"

traits.locale_text: 「アベラルド、随分と静かね。自分の為に場所選びをしているのか？あのかわいい棺は、どの棺よりもよく見えるわ！」

languages.text: “这里实在是有点太安静了，阿贝拉德。你是在给自己选墓地吗？那个漂亮的小棺材看起来挺不错的！”
languages.original_text: "You're awful quiet there, Abelard. Are you picking out a nice spot for yourself? That pretty little casket looks as good as any!"

traits.locale_text: “这里实在是有点太安静了，阿贝拉德。你是在给自己选墓地吗？那个漂亮的小棺材看起来挺不错的！”

languages.original_text: "You're awful quiet there, Abelard. Are you picking out a nice spot for yourself? That pretty little casket looks as good as any!"

languages.text: "Sen bu kadar sessiz kalmazdın Abelard. Kendine güzel bir yer mi bakıyorsun? Şu güzel, ufak tabut işini görür!"
languages.original_text: "You're awful quiet there, Abelard. Are you picking out a nice spot for yourself? That pretty little casket looks as good as any!"
